data: Dr. Helena Patel works as a Senior Executive Consultant at ConsultPro Advisors in the Management Consulting industry with over 15 years of experience.
Dr. Helena Patel is based in Boston, MA, US.
Dr. Helena Patel holds a PhD in Organizational Psychology.
Dr. Helena Patel specializes in change management, leadership development, and strategic planning.
Dr. Helena Patel analyzed client satisfaction surveys and delivered a whitepaper on organizational transformation.
Dr. Helena Patel authored three industry publications and led more than ten multi-million dollar transformation programs.
Dr. Helena Patelâ€™s skills include executive coaching, project management, and data analysis.
